title: Minimalist Credit Card Wallet Front Pocket Slim Business Card Holder Money Clip Slim Wallet Rfid Blocking for Men
description:
Minimalist Wallet, Aluminum Slim Wallet Front Pocket Credit Card Case & Money Clip Wallets with RFID Blocking.
With RFID blocking protection design, this wallet will keep your private information and credit card away from thieves' scanning devices, insure your private property safety, while the money clip can hold cash well. Now this wallet can insurance card without having the big bulge in your front/back pocket. It’s the time to throw away your old bulky purse.

Got tired of the bulky wallet?

Downsize to something that could hold 2-12 cards and hundreds dollars.
Because our Card Holder & Money Clip is lightweight, and designed to fit into the pockets of dress pants, jeans or shorts, the guys takes it from work to play.
So if you are looking for a lightweight money clip to replace your bulky wallet.

This minimalist slim wallet can block RFID signals from cards working at 13.56MHz, including:

1) Credit card/ debit card
2) ID card
3) Driver license
Specification

Product size: 3.4 * 2. * 0.5 inches
Product weight: 1.8 oz
features: RFID BLOCKING WIRELESS THEFT - RFID blocking protection design, keep your private information and credit card away from thieves' scanning devices, insure your private property safety.  slide wallet farthest protects your credit cards, debit cards, passports and driver licenses.
LIGHTWEIGHT - Slim body makes the case wallet easy to carry and you are not feel embarrassed any more for the bulge on the back pockets of your pants.
Ultra slim and light weight, best for front/back pocket.
HUMANIZED DESIGN - The elastics is convenient for you to put your credit cards, ID card into it, C shape mouth is for you to pull out the cards easily.

MONEY CLIP & ELASTIC WEBBING - The classical money clip is made of spring steel, it can be used to hold cash, RFID-enabled cards, or business cards variously. Flexible elastic webbing greatly improved the card holding capacity, its just perfect for card carrier.
